Reviews.Title: “Great place to go. Will be back next year”
Reviews.Author: Eric L
Reviews.Content: Great location, Very close to the beach. No frill, Clean, spotless. We have a designated parking spot. The kitchen is very usefull and we passed a very good week vacation on site. There is plenty of space on the beach, and not crowded at all. The owner are very nice.

Reviews.Title: “wonderful stay”
Reviews.Author: Debbie B
Reviews.Content: We had the best vacation while staying here. The rooms were roomy and clean. The owners are wonderful -- very friendly, accommodating. It is at the quiet side of Daytona. We will stay there again, any time we are in Daytona.

Reviews.Title: “great place”
Reviews.Author: Andre T
Reviews.Content: this is the ideal place for a vacation by the sea. the owners pete,marylin,chris keep the property spotlessly clean. the premises are quiet ,all you hear are the waves. i've been there 4 times and can't wait for the next vacation (spring 2013) atrudelle canada

Reviews.Title: “better than 5 star Hotel!”
Reviews.Author: scooby3d
Reviews.Content: My family of 4 just stayed for a week for the first time after hearing about this place for many years. We went without huge expectations considering it is not a high-rise hotel we were used to. When we got there and went to our room we were very surprised. The whole place is SPOTLESS and is kept that way the entire time you are there! Everything is cleaned everyday. You never need for anything. Our unit had a kitchen and already had what we needed to cook and eat with except paper goods and our food. I am also very impressed with the staff. The owners Pierre and Marilyn Joncas, their son Chris and their 2 long time employed cleaning ladies. They are all the most attentive and helpful people you could imagine. My family will DEFINITELY be returning for another great time!

Reviews.Title: “Another Great Beach Vacation”
Reviews.Author: JHawk0769
Reviews.Content: We stay here every year for the last 6 spring breaks. Every year at the end of the week my wife and I ask our kids if they want to come back here next year. We get a very authoritative "YES!!, We love it here!". This is a wonderful location with great people. The owners are very welcoming and accommodate you as best as they can. There aren’t any hassles or anxiety with this hotel. Its just relaxing. Quick access to stores, restaurants, activities. See you again next year.

Reviews.Title: “Great location, great people”
Reviews.Author: Marcwva1
Reviews.Content: First stay at the Royal and loved it! No frills but a perfect location, close to the pier and the traffic on the beach stopped. I felt very safe and enjoyed the wonderful staff and hosts. Very clean and loved the large refrigerator. Will be back.

Reviews.Title: “Another great bike week trip”
Reviews.Author: Kathy987
Reviews.Content: Another great trip to bike week, thanks to our lovely hosts Marilyn, Pierre and Chris. They bend over backwards to make sure your stay is a comfortable one. What can I say that hasn't been said? The location is fantastic, just a short10 miles or less, south of Daytona proper, and access to numerous major routes. The hotel rooms are very clean and the grounds/salt water pool are well maintained. It also has a private access to the beach and ocean. Each room has a refrigerator and small stove/oven for those who enjoy cooking while on vacation. But if you don’t, there are plenty of places to eat. Can’t decide where to go, just ask you hosts and they will be glad to advise you of local haunts. Can’t wait to return next year, or maybe if we’re lucky, Biketoberfest. Kathy and Jim

Reviews.Title: “Another 4 days in paradise”
Reviews.Author: sigcat
Reviews.Content: as promised returned to the great folks at royal holiday great hosts and great guests good luck pierre on your knee surgery paul and sharon from alabama

Reviews.Title: “Stayed for three nights during Labor Day weekend and loved it!”
Reviews.Author: ysobora88
Reviews.Content: I stayed with my family at the hotel for three nights during Labor Day weekend. The rooms were very clean and the owners were extremely helpful. There is WiFi at the motel, but the best connection is near the office, so the further your room is from the office, the less connection you will get. The only disadvantage was that our stay was spontaneous and we didn’t make a reservation. Therefore, there were not many rooms available and there was a minimum night stay. I definitely recommend making a reservation and choosing the location of your room. The motel is right on the beach which is very convenient and the seawater pool at the motel is very clean. In addition, there is a nice American food restaurant a walking distance from the motel. Overall, this was a great experience and we will definitely be back.

Reviews.Title: “Our home away from home”
Reviews.Author: Cindy M
Reviews.Content: I have been staying at this motel since I was a young girl. My daddy's whole family would go down every year and stay here for our 1 week vacation. We all started growing up and having families of our own and still kept going to Royal Holiday. Pierre, Marilyn and Chris are the best. They treat us like family. The rooms are so clean and that is what we always look for. We try to go here every year, unless we decide to go to another state or go on a cruise and then we still try to stay there for day on our way to Port Canaveral. I am now 42 and my husband and I will have our first grandchild sometime in the next few weeks and we are already booked to take him (with his mom and dad) to Royal Holiday for his first Florida vacation and hopefull he will continue with a long tradition. We love this place and you could not find a better hotel!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Best vacation we have had in years.”
Reviews.Author: Joyce T
Reviews.Content: We have vacationed all over the state of Florida. This has to be the cleanest motels we have ever stayed in. The owners, Marilyn and Pete,along with their son Chris, do such a great job at making you feel so welcome and take care of your every need with a smile. We are looking forward to going back again next year. Thanks for a great holiday. Joyce and Kevin.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect Location for a DIY Family Beach Vacation”
Reviews.Author: marvista3412
Reviews.Content: Our family of four recently stayed 7 nights at the Royal Holiday in mid-October 2011. Our two boys (ages 8 and 6) attend school in a district that recently changed over to a year-round calendar, so they now have a two-week vacation each October. We discovered Royal Holiday via its #1 rating on TripAdvisor for hotels in the Daytona Beach area. Our fantastic experience affirms for us the value-added service provided by the TripAdvisor website, as we would never have found this place on our own. We stayed in an efficiency that directly overlooked the ocean. From our room, we could look through our window (or our open front door, if we chose to keep it open) and at various times see: • top-notch surfers riding the waves by the fishing pier • paddleboard surfing, where surfers stand straight up and use a long paddle to propel themselves through the ocean and catch waves • dolphins playing in the sea • fishing boats in the distance • sunrise or sunset over the ocean • the constant crashing of waves on the beach. As others have noted in previous reviews, the owners Marilyn and Pierre and wonderful and make you feel welcome from the moment you arrive. We spent all week on the beach. We went Boogie Boarding every day, and found many other ways to relax and enjoy the beach including reading, walking, building sand castles, collecting sea shells, going out on the fishing pier to watch the surfers up close, and even taking a surfing lesson from two pros (via the Daytona Beach Surfing School). We also spent time in the salt-water pool at the Royal Holiday, which was refreshing and a fun place to hang out. The Royal Holiday has plenty of Boogie Boards, beach chairs, and sand toys available free of charge for guests to use. We ate in every day as part of our DIY beach vacation. There is a large Publix supermarket less than a mile away up the road, and with the kitchen in our room we were able to prepare all of our own breakfasts, lunches and dinners. We found the Royal Holiday to be the perfect location for a DIY family beach vacation. It was also quite affordable - our October stay cost less than $100/night. We fully expect to return next year, and now completely understand why so many guests here return year after year.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: Jetdispatcher
Reviews.Content: Clean and fun place to stay. Great location and Wonderful owners.

Reviews.Title: “The Place to Stay in Daytona”
Reviews.Author: flmarg1
Reviews.Content: We enjoyed the perfect 4 day mini-vacation. This was our first visit but it definitely won't be the last. I have never felt so welcome--the difference between the owners being in residence vs a hotel chain. Our spacious effeciency was clean & comfortable, the salt water pool was so refreshing. Motel rooms are also available. The waves of the Atlantic right in front of our room mesmerized me. The beach is right there for the beach walkers. Unfortunately, we didn't swim in the Atlantic this visit due to a jellyfish influx. The location was great, making all Daytona's attractions so accessible. Another customer summed it up nicely: "My only complaint is that there's nothing to complain about!"

Reviews.Title: “Awesome Motel, Wonderful trip. Will definitely stay again”
Reviews.Author: KevinWarren
Reviews.Content: All the positive reviews about the Royal Holiday were spot on. The owners are attentive to their customer's needs, the rooms are clean and well maintained. The pool area is awesome and it's right on the beach. The owners have a supply of beach chairs and towels in case you forget or don't bring them. Marilyn, the owner, went out of her way to make us feel welcome and hand delivered coffee to my door while we were enjoying the beach. To quote Marilyn, 'ask and you shall receive' and that was definitely the case. Some guests have been staying at the Royal Holiday for 35 years. 35 years! That's loyalty and speaks volumes about the place and the owners. We will absolutely stay there again. It was awesome.

Reviews.Title: “Can't wait to come back”
Reviews.Author: dennis-carol
Reviews.Content: We stayed 4 days over labor day weekend. It was our first stay and we will definitly be back. The owners (Marilyn and Pierre) are very friendly and they make sure that everyone has what they need. They go out of their way to make you feel at home. The rooms are very clean and comfortable. The location is great. We will definitely make a return visit soon.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay!!”
Reviews.Author: April1_83
Reviews.Content: The Royal Holiday Beach Motel is a family owned and run establishment. The owners are super friendly and provide great service to guests. The Royal Holiday is clean and quiet. This motel is right on the beach and provides a walkway right down to the water. Most of the rooms provide kitchenettes so you can do cooking of your own. We visit this motel every year!!

Reviews.Title: “We stay here every year!”
Reviews.Author: jlsanders78
Reviews.Content: A large group of our family and friends stay here every year and have for over 15 years. It is always clean and quiet. The owners are fantastic. It's close enough to everything (including great restaurants), but far from all the Daytona craziness.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful place to stay . We plan to make it our yearly destination.”
Reviews.Author: AlexisEW056
Reviews.Content: My huband and I with our two boys spent a wonderful week at this hotel. It was super clean , excellent price and the location was perfect . We spent most of our time playing in the pool and lying on the beach. The location of the hotel was perfect because we could choose to go to downtown Daytona for a night out or head south just a few minutes to Ponce Inlet for quiet walk and see more sights. We enjoyed ourselves so much that we plan to make this our yearly spot to stay while in Florida.

Reviews.Title: “Will stay here again”
Reviews.Author: debcarey40
Reviews.Content: This hotel offers what most large hotel chains and condos have lost sight of. The owners are very personable and take great care to make sure your stay in their hotel and you vacation experience is very positive. The rooms are the cleanest I've seen anywhere. The atmosphere inside and out is relaxing and their location on the south side of Myrtle Beach allows for a private stay when yo don't want to deal with the hustle of large crowds on the beach. Perfect for couples and families. Nicely located to the Pier (not the mainstreet) but just walking distance to fish or grab a nice breakfast or lunch. The food and service there was also good. We will definitely stay here again!

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful helpful owners”
Reviews.Author: Carjac5449
Reviews.Content: Very clean spacious room at a reasonable price. Located in a quiet area with plenty of restaurants to chose from. We will be back.

Reviews.Title: “The best place to stay in Daytona!!”
Reviews.Author: wrenchboy81
Reviews.Content: My family and I have been staying here for years. We have stayed a lot of other places in the area but nothing comes close to this place. It is family owned. When you stay here they make you feel very welcomed. Other motels and hotels need to come to this place and stay and take notes. Will be coming back here for many years to come.

Reviews.Title: “Great Clean and friendly place to stay”
Reviews.Author: rgodby
Reviews.Content: First time too stay at the Royal Holiday motel. We walked in to check in, and was greeted by Marlyn who was so friendly. We went to our room and foun the cleanest Motel room we had ever stayed in. Marlyn, Piere and son were friendly thru the whole stay.

Reviews.Title: “A wonderful holiday - I'd return there tomorrow if I could”
Reviews.Author: DaveNut
Reviews.Content: My holiday at the Royal Holiday Beach Motel was everything great that all the other reviewers have said. My own stay was faultless. The initial welcome and introduction to the motel by Chris was lovely. He educated me during the first few days of my stay on any subject relating to the motel and Daytona and he provided me with whatever I needed to ensure that my stay was perfect - this included a sun bed, a corkscrew and even a peg to hang up my beach towel. My room was perfectly located facing the ocean and very well furnished. Most importantly, it was lovely and clean (thanks also to Flora for the daily tidy-up). When Marylin and Pierre returned from their own holiday they also went out of their way to ensure that I was fully suited and satisfied. Lovely people and hopefully now, new friends. I was also very surprised at how friendly the other guests were. I'm sure that they initially thought my northern-English accent was a little strange but everyone made me welcome and we soon got chatting whilst giving one-another the space to enjoy our own holidays. My motel neighbours Larry and then Dave (and their respective families) and the couple from Canada and then the big family from Georia were all fabulous to speak to. All in all, a lovely holiday which, on this occasion lasted ten nights for me. I would indeed go back tomorrow if I could - I'll certainly return again one-day providing that Marylin, Pierre and Chris will have me. Who could ever forget the view - particularly at sunrise. It was indeed wonderful, thanks to all at the Royal.

Reviews.Title: “Great”
Reviews.Author: armandoandangeline
Reviews.Content: We stayed based on the reviews we read on tripadvisor and all are true. Nice people and a very well kept property on the beach. What else do you need?

Reviews.Title: “Immaculate rooms and gracious hosts”
Reviews.Author: gjhiker
Reviews.Content: Stayed for 9 nights in late May-early June 2011. Older, but very well-maintained motel with comfortable beds and all the conveniences you would need. We stayed in a efficiency unit that had full kitchen facilities, but they also have some basic motel rooms. We cannot over-emphasize the fact that not only the rooms, but the pool area and the entire grounds are super clean. The owners are extremely accommodating and made our stay very enjoyable. This motel is right on the beach and the pool is between the room area and the beach, so it is very convenient. In summary, this is a clean place at a very affordable price. We would recommend it to couples or a family on vacation.

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding!!!”
Reviews.Author: Sis_Denson
Reviews.Content: I second all the good comments. Marilyn & Pierre are unique in that they take pride in their business, and it shows, everywhere. Everything is immaculate, well beyond just clean. Instead of just another guest, you are treated like you're family. Marilyn goes out of her way to make sure you are comfortable and that everything is perfect. The large hotel chains could learn a lot from Marilyn & Pierre. We will be back... Mike & Sis Denson

Reviews.Title: “Warm welcome, very clean, great location, quiet.”
Reviews.Author: Carali_10
Reviews.Content: This is an older property but well kept. The owners are friendly and helpful, and the location is outstanding, right on a beautiful stretch of soft white sand beach. The hotel is an easy drive to a Publix grocery and to Daytona and New Smyrna. Our room was clean and spacious, with a full kitchen. Only one word of advice, there wasn't a blow dryer in the room, so be sure to pack one if you need it to style your hair after a day at the beach.

Reviews.Title: “The BEST place to stay”
Reviews.Author: impalaman63
Reviews.Content: I know you will not find a better place to stay. This place is SUPER clean and I mean SUPER CLEAN.The owners live on the site and they are the BEST, very peace full place . We had a room with a kitchenette,the room had a kitchen table,convection microwave,frig,cooking pots, dishes, couch,recliner and queen bed,TV and the room was huge. The bathrooms are super. NO mold around the tub, like some other places.They have chairs outside each room, also beach chairs,towels and boogie boards to take down to the beach. The pool is on the beach side of the building.This is their web side http://www.royalholidaybeachmotel.com/ You can catch the A1A Beachside trolley on Phylis Ave and South Atlantic Ave about 450 feet north of the Hotel. Web page http://volusia.org/votran/default.htm The sunglow pier is about 375 feet away and food is served. http://www.sunglowpier.com/

Reviews.Title: “A gem”
Reviews.Author: MikeKat
Reviews.Content: What a hidden gem. Spotless, unit was an efficiency with stove, frig, micro etc. We didn't use, but everything was immaculate. Our room was 5' from the pool and 50' to the beautiful beach and another 200yds to the pier with fishing and a nice restaurant. The owners are so pleasant and helpful. Ask them for their recommendations on where to eat, and listen to them.. Aunts Catfish belies the name. What a menu and the salad bar has to be the freshest and best in Florida. Rated # 1 by trip advisor and I can see why. Thats why we stayed there.

Reviews.Title: “This is the most friendly, clean beautiful place we have ever stayed”
Reviews.Author: par1reg
Reviews.Content: My wife and I vacationed at the Royal Holiday Beach Motel for a month and it was the greatest place we have ever stayed. Pierre, Marilyn and Chris couldn't do enough for us to make our stay so very pleasant and comfortable. The motel is spotless and maintained that way vigorously by them. When we required information all we had to do was ask. The location is ideal for people who love the baech and close to shopping, groceries and restaurants. We booked our room for next year before we left and can hardly wait to get back to our family away from home.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome Place- Awesome Staff”
Reviews.Author: Bisch33
Reviews.Content: Just returned from a weeks stay at the Royal Holiday Beach Motel. The stay was awesome. The rooms, pool and grounds are exceptionally clean. The owners will bend over backwards to make your stay as enjoyable as possible. Will definitely be returning for another vacation with these outstanding hosts. Need advice on where to go to eat, Marilyn will be more than happy to help you find a spot. Thanks again Marilyn, Pierre and Chris. Look forward to another stay will you fine people.

Reviews.Title: “Home away from home!”
Reviews.Author: kkielbania
Reviews.Content: I have been going to Daytona Beach since I was 5 years old. Pete & Marilyn (owners) have watched me grow. I've missed the last 7 years but this year now married and with a family of my own decided to take our first family vacation. I couldn't imagine a better place. So I talked it up with my husband and he said let's go. We planned a weeks vacation with an 11 year old and almost 2 year old. The place is perfect. Friendly, clean, all sorts of ammenities to meet your needs...large pool, ocean in your front yard, morning paper and did I say friendly! They go out of their way to make sure you are having the time of your life! It truly is home away from home. All of the other guests are friendly and look after one another. You hate to leave. We just got home today and my husband said I didn't talk it "up" enough. We are planning our return trip already! Thank You, Thank You, Thank You Joncas Family. We Love You...the Kielbanias.

Reviews.Title: “Fabulous stay during our annual March break vacation!”
Reviews.Author: CSauve98
Reviews.Content: Knowledge is power so guess what? Next year, The Daytona 500 is February 26, 2012. The motorcycle event is March 9 to 18, 2012. Therefore, Daytona Beach Shores will be very quiet February 27 to March 9. We are going back to our "home away from home", the Royal Holiday Beach Motel. It is a great place to stay on the beach. The owners are great and very accomodating. The rooms are super clean, the heated pool is a treat and the beach is a few steps away. A great place to spend March break!!

Reviews.Title: “Best ever - my March Break getaway for 10 years ... visit early next year”
Reviews.Author: OttawaWintervacation
Reviews.Content: We are going back to our favourite vacation spot again in 2012. But the owners have told us to come earlier. The Daytona 500 and Bike Week (March 9-18, 2012) are both later next year. So we are going to Royal Holiday during last week of February and first week of March when rooms are available. Royal Holiday is clean, clean, clean ... immaculate. The pool is steps from the beach, so we play in the surf and swim in the heated pool. And there is a seafood pier right next door. Love it! You will too.!

Reviews.Title: “Our favorite vacation spot!”
Reviews.Author: RBW57
Reviews.Content: This family-run motel is exceptionally clean and located right on the beach. Most rooms have kitchens. The pool area is a wonderful place to soak up some sun! March is their busy season, and when we like to travel, but the owners have told us that it will be quiet in Daytona Beach Shores between Feb. 27 and Mar. 9 of next year because of the changes to Bike Week. So we'll be booking our holiday a little early next year.

Reviews.Title: “Impecably clean, peaceful and quiet, friendly atmosphere”
Reviews.Author: ourfloridatrips
Reviews.Content: Just returned from in mid February after 16 night stay. 2011 is our 12th year of staying there. Immaculately maintained, prices are competitive, peaceful and quiet atmosphere where one can be totally relaxed. Owners are hands-on and appreciate the business. The rooms always look like they've just been rennovated. If you're looking to be on the ocean, and don't want a lot of noise and other annoying behavior, then this is 4 Star. We fly down there 3 times per year now. Highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: “Royal Holiday is privately owned accomodations at their best”
Reviews.Author: phyllis21443
Reviews.Content: Our stay was extremely satisfactory. We found the staff to be genuinely concerned with making sure everthing was up to our expectations. It is so good to deal with the owners- someone who actually has "skin in the game" rather than staff who can't wait for their shift to be over. Royal Holiday will bring back memories of what is was like before the large chain operations filled the landscape. I don't know how they could improve any aspect of our visit. Meticuously clean rooms and pool in fact the whole property was as clean and neat as it gets. Try it you'll like it!!

Reviews.Title: “The best hotel ever”
Reviews.Author: WVUgirl06
Reviews.Content: The hotel is VERY CLEAN! The owners are the best. Anything that you need they will get for you - to make your stay the best ever. The owners treat you like family. We have stayed there for two years in the month of January and will be going back again next year. We have highly recommended this hotel to everyone that we talk with. You can not got wrong by staying here. Also, you can leave your valuables in your room (laptop, cell phone, jewerly) and it is never touched. Very dependable people that work for the owners also. I can't say enough good things about this hotel and the owners!

Reviews.Title: “The Royal Holiday Beach Motel is an absolute gem!”
Reviews.Author: Secondof8
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed at the Royal Holiday Beach Motel as a result of a recommendation from friends. What a delight! The motel is a quaint lodging with incredibly nice owners, Marilyn and Pete. The comfortable rooms are well equipped with a small kitchen and CLEAN. After staying in several of the larger hotel chains throughout the country, we found this motel to be a refreshing change. We were only there for three nights, but did not want to leave. Can't wait to return!

Reviews.Title: “Just as good second visit”
Reviews.Author: Kayli
Reviews.Content: This was our second stay and it was perfect. It felt like returning home. We were remembered from our previous visit and this made us feel very welcome. The high standard is still maintained, exceptionally clean and everything one could want available. Location is perfect for a beach holiday with some peace and quite. It's far enough from the main attractions but not too far. Hope to go back soon. It made our holiday complete. Thank you Marilyn and Pierre. Love Lesley & Mick, Colchester, Essex

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location, clean and friendly motel.”
Reviews.Author: Tam519
Reviews.Content: This was our second visit to this Motel. Marilyn and Pierre who run this Motel are the nicest friendly people you could meet. They are extremely helpful and everything they do is always done with a smile. It is located right on the beach, with a good size swimming pool, they will provide beach towels and chairs if you need them, also an iron/ ironing board and even books to read. Will definitely reccomend this Motel. Hope to return soon. Tamara and Dave Page from Colchester England

Reviews.Title: “Clean, comfortable and most welcoming!”
Reviews.Author: NorthernPeach
Reviews.Content: My sister and I were in the Orlando/Daytona Beach area for 5 days. During our visit we stayed in an ocean view efficiency on the second floor. You will not find a better place for comfort, or for a staff that is welcoming and helpful. I would swim laps in the pool at 6:15 in the morning, to then be done to watch the sunrise. The beach is down the steps, and walking it we'd see birds, crabs, jellyfish, turtle tracks (nesting season). One sunrise was accompanied with dolphins frolicking about 50 yards from shore. Marilyn, her family and staff are terrific, and had great suggestions for restaurants in the area. I would stay here again, without reservation (pun intended!).

Reviews.Title: “Nice Family Friendly Hotel. Like Home away from Home”
Reviews.Author: JHawk0769
Reviews.Content: We stay at this Hotel evey year when we go to Daytona Beach. The rooms are very clean, and nice. The room we stayeed in had a small kitchenette to fix quick meals when we come up from the pool or beach. This is a great place to go with kids and have beach chairs and boogey board available to use. The owners are very nice and will know you by name and strike up a passing conversation when they see you! We feel very safe here with our kids (6&8), and it is right on the beach. We are 5 minutes from anything we need (resturaunts, grocery store, etc).

Reviews.Title: “Another Great Stay at Royal Holiday!!”
Reviews.Author: Kat_Cubs_fan
Reviews.Content: We just returned from our fourth stay at Royal Holiday Beach Motel during the first week of November, 2009, and we can't find a better place for us in Daytona as this place is almost perfect for our needs. This is one of the last GREAT small beachside motels in Daytona left after all the condos have been built in the past few years. Royal Holiday is everything we want in a small, family-owned beachside motel. The Joncas family take real pride in their small hotel and we really enjoy staying with them. Just three doors south of the Sunglow Peir, location is excellent, especially for Port Orange access via the Dunlawton Bridge. The motel has only about 30 to 32 rooms and two floors (top floor has best views of ocean), but the rooms are huge, clean, and bright, windows worked well and sealed good, the closet had adequate space for all our clothes with large mirror on front, and the A/C worked very well in the room, which is important in a high-humidity place like the beach. The beds aren't quite as firm as I'm used to, but I sleep on a rock-hard mattress at home, so that's probably not an issue for most folks. We had a full kitchen, with full-sized fridge/freezer and stove. Plenty of pots, pans, and cooking utensils are supplied as well. The bathroom is small and bathroom storage is limited, but there is a good-sized cabinet under the sink vanity. The bathrooms are also very clean and well maintained, even if the fixtures are older. The Joncas family are very good about keeping the entire motel very well maintained and will have any problems you encounter fixed as soon as they can. Housekeeping service is very good, but is not provided on Sunday or holidays, so fair warning if this bothers you. They do, however, leave you enough towels, soap, and toilet paper to get you through. Location of food services is very close by, with some great restaurants in the area (within 1 mile even). Port Orange is just across the Dunlawton bridge and you can find everything there, including a Wal-Mart Supercenter and a Super Target. The K-Mart in Port Orange (Nova Rd) has now closed, but there's still plenty of other businesses in the area and more restaurants than you can count. I definitely recommend this motel for a beach-side Daytona stay. You won't find a better small motel along Atlantic Ave.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location, excellent staff.”
Reviews.Author: Tam519
Reviews.Content: We arrived at this motel without booking as our itineray was flexible,as it was on the beach we expected it to be fully booked, but fortunately for us there were 2 rooms beside each other with sea views. The owners Marilyn and her husband, couldn't have been nicer, or more helpful. They provided beach towels and loungers,and also some washing powder for the machine free of charge. The rooms were were very well maintained and clean and spacious. We travel a lot in the USA and love the great hospatality we receive 99% of the time, but at this motel they give 100%.Thanks Marilyn we had a great time hope to be back soon.

Reviews.Title: “A little gem”
Reviews.Author: Kayli
Reviews.Content: This motel was a wonderful place to stay. We stayed the last four nights of our touring holiday here. We wanted somewhere to just chill out in preparation of our flight back to the U.K. We drove in and looked at the motel, it was spotless. We ask if we could see one of the room before we decided and Marilyn showed us room 11 and 12, on the same level as the car park, overlooking pool and beach. The rooms themselves were spotless and had very comfortable beds and alot of space, a kitchen area with everything in it even a kettle which meant alot to us Brits. We would recommend this place to anyone and we hope to go back soon. The hosts were lovely people and so helpful nothing was too much trouble for them. (I must also mention that this motel is very near to Crabby's on the pier and they do the most fantastic chocolate sundae) We also watched the sun rise and the dolphins swim. Beautiful.

Reviews.Title: “Quiet, clean, relaxing place to stay”
Reviews.Author: gwilymj
Reviews.Content: This motel is located right on the beach. The owners are very friendly and make sure their rooms are kept neat, clean and modern. Easy access to a main road that has restaurants, Wal-mart, access to I-95 and a lot more. The pier is close with food and fishing. I have been staying here for years and keep going back because it is so care free and you can count on this place being clean and well-kept. They even have beach lounge chairs available!

Reviews.Title: “The absolute best motel to stay in Daytona........”
Reviews.Author: wisekani
Reviews.Content: We have stayed here many times over the years and always comeback. The motel is very clean, the grounds, pool and the owners are just the best. I came with a friend the last trip, and no matter where you are located there is an ocean view. As women traveling alone, this motel is an extra plus, they make you feel safe and at home. We have stayed here when our kids were in school and it is far enough away from the Daytona hoopla that you can enjoy it yourselves and let the kids run on the beach or in the pool. I really love all of the convience and the affordability. Great for family, or senior.

Reviews.Title: “A great motel at a great location.”
Reviews.Author: momof3Ontario
Reviews.Content: The owners are very friendly. Many of the rooms have kitchen facilities with dishes and pots and pans. The entire motel is clean including the heated pool and parking lot. There is direct beach access. A great place to have a wonderful vacation. Thanks again to the Joncas family from the Sauve's.

Reviews.Title: “Home away from home”
Reviews.Author: sweetpea50
Reviews.Content: This was our third visit to the Royal Holiday Beach. We are looking forward to our visit again in 2008. The owners and staff are wonderful.

Reviews.Title: “Peaceful rooms, Friendly owners, Wonderful view!”
Reviews.Author: CynthiaKJ
Reviews.Content: This is a wonderful location, sideways to the breeze and facing the shore. Personal, warm, friendly. Feels like you're staying at a cottage on the beach. You can watch the surf from your room, or chairs placed in front of each room, or benches placed at the edge of the property or just walk down a few steps to the beach. Two hotels from Crabby Joe's pier and right next to a treasure of a little breakfast restaurant! The owners and their son are very nice people. Other vacationers are quiet, preserving the sense of peace. Private parking is located in an inner court. Decor is a little dated, but scrupulously clean and maintained. I can still close my eyes and recapture the feeling of serenity.

Reviews.Title: “Friendly Owners and Great Place To Stay..”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: I've been going to this hotel ever since I was 4 years old. I've always enjoyed staying there and the owners are very sweet. They make you feel like home :)

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful place!! Quiet and clean!”
Reviews.Author: stormy1964
Reviews.Content: My boyfriend and I stayed at Royal Hoilday for a little over 2 weeks and were very pleasantly surprised when we got to the motel--exceptionally clean and comfortable, extra large rooms and efficiencies directly on the beach. A very well american run motel. Would recommend to all who would like a calm and relaxing vacation.

Reviews.Title: “A Royal place to stay”
Reviews.Author: brisimono
Reviews.Content: Very clean rooms. Grounds very well maintained. The owners are very friendly. And for the French visitors, the owners speak some French. We visited a dozen other motel and none compare. We recommend to every one.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, spacious, great location”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We've stayed at the Royal Holiday on numerous occasions. The rooms are always clean and well maintained. The staff is friendly and accommodating. It's a great place to stay.

Reviews.Title: “great place the royal holiday”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: clean ,well maintained, very accommodating, loved this place as soon as the door was open to look inside, clean & bright, we have been staying here for the last four nov.s & winter mo.s

Reviews.Title: “restfull”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: My wife and I have spent the last three late spring vacations here. The rooms were clean and the staff friendly. Mr Lee and his family were very friendly and made us welcome. A good place to take the family and stay a week or two.

Reviews.Title: “Family vacation”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: My family has been visiting this hotel for several years- we love this place!! The management is wonderful! They still continue to maintain their rates to be affordable and the place is also always clean and nice.

Reviews.Title: “Best Beach Anywhere”
Reviews.Author: belbon
Reviews.Content: My family goes to Daytona Beach just about every summer. We stay at the Port Orange end (Daytona Beach Shores) at the Royal Holiday, which is a very nice, clean, family run hotel. All rooms are ocean front or ocean view. It's a very quiet and friendly hotel, with an ocean front pool. And if your looking for great seafood, Sweetwater's is THE restaurant to go to! This summer we decided to try something different and we went to Panama City Beach instead, which was a lot of fun, but we all missed Daytona and the Royal Holiday!

HotelInfo.Name: Royal Holiday Beach Motel
HotelInfo.Address: 3717 South Atlantic Avenue, Daytona Beach, FL 32118
